system.note: +3 AP to Arm and Body when wielded (stacks with armour). can be crafted out of Ceramite or Adamantium, is no longer Primitive (8), but is two steps rarer (by default Scarce).

description.value:
Special: Primitive (8), Defensive

Note: +3 AP to Arm and Body when wielded (stacks with armour). can be crafted out of Ceramite or Adamantium, is no longer Primitive (8), but is two steps rarer (by default Scarce).
